event.title: is increased by thousands of seasonal residents and weekend

data.event: Thus, its year-round population of several hundred is increased by thousands of seasonal residents and weekend day-trippers during summer months.

event.title: was settled by Thomas Burgess in 1868

data.event: Bala was settled by Thomas Burgess in 1868.
In 1914, the town incorporated with Burgess' son as the first mayor making it the smallest incorporated town in Canada.
